A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Half star.  As a standalone movie for some brand new SF series\, I would rate this much higher\, but the worst and most unforgivable things about this film are how it relates to the other movies before it and after it.

Luke tossing the lightsaber over his shoulder was essentially what RJ did to the franchise with this movie.  RJ threw away the opportunity to take the great start to a new trilogy from the FA and instead combined the prequel movies\, with a marvel movie.

I have 0 excitement to see the future disney Star Wars movies after seeing what they allowed in this movie.
